thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Homesick
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Homesick

author: Homesick
title: Homesick
text: Moving from Maine to the Midwest, we missed the taste of fresh lobster. Even the live lobsters sold around here just don't taste the same. As a special birthday treat we decided to try getting lobster straight from Maine and Maine Lobster Now did not disappoint! The order process was simple, and they arrived as promised, complete with fresh seaweed on top. The only thing missing from a true Maine lobster experience was the plastic lobster bibs.
